page.title: 03A CHILD'S DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: My name is Gaynor. I am a girl aged 11. I leave home with my sister at 8.35 am to go to school. We arrive there at about 8.50. The whistle is blown by a teacher at 8.55 and we line up in classes to enter school. In the classroom our teacher marks the register and asks who is staying at school for lunch. At 9.15 we have {assembly.}We sing hymns and say prayers. This is taken by one of the teachers. At 9.45 we return to our classroom and we are told what the work is for that day. We have{language and{mathematics}each day. We also have {science, art and project}during the week. One afternoon we have{singing and we have{P.E and games}twice a week. We have a 15 minute break in the morning and a 10 minute break in the afternoon. We have an hour for lunch. I go home. School ends at 3.45 pm.
